comment.author: 79549278@N03
comment._content:
When I saw this photo, black and white, I was reminded of a book I bought from the Gramedia bookstore, titled THE GREAT LIFE photographers, this book is a collection of LIFE magazine world photograper who lived the early twentieth century. It's interesting from a hundred and one photograper only five are women: namely Margaret Bourke-White, Marie Hansen, Martha Holmes, Lisa Larsen, and Nina Leen. Well, when I saw the photo collection in this image: Is one of them? Or not? However, this photo is incredible. Great shot! Best Picture, thanks.
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/_sun_flower_/8538114919/in/photostream]
